post.body: Well, we realize that we need to say things multiple ways (or repeatedly) to help people have that 'eureka' effect when learning.
have you ever had plantain chips? Much more addictive than banana chips!
Remember to take calcium and glucosamine, so your joints last longer over time. As dancers, we pound our joints more than average.
Are you sure you don't have the FP10 debugging version installed by mistake?
Let me know next time if you are looking for the digital version.
Flash has a bad rap due to bad design. (bad popups and banners). But if you look at the latest generation of Flex apps you'll see.
We'll put it on the queue. We would also like to do one on cha-cha
Making UIs in Java is like grinding coffee with a spoon. I love Flash. :-)
Yes, we are planning on shooting new videos this christmas during my vacation time. We are still looking for a studio in San Diego
Back from vacation! I'm not looking forward to pumping myself with adrenaline to catch up with all my non-salsa work... :-( fochi !
Is anyone else having trouble downloading or watching the a2s salsa videos?
is off to Santa Maria CA for Xmas
How to do the 180Â° CrossBody Lead with a Turn #addicted2salsa :http://is.gd/d41l
Finally found a studio to shoot new videos! Excited to continue making salsa dancing accessible to everyone.
If they only had one of these for Cha-Cha :http://is.gd/c2Uz
Added Hebrew and Portuguese translation options due to request! It is very exciting to have more languages on addicted2salsa.
I hope this never happens to salsa songs: http://is.gd/b62F . I will need a cochlear implant after this.
Anyone from the Bangalore salsa scene? If so, where to take lessons?
Anyone want some of my boxee invites? http://boxee.tv/
Just got a great set of Spanish translations for our videos by EmECorp!
